text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.title: Mob Variants Config
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.z: Convert Zombies to Forgottens under selected Y level:
Zombies have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.f: Fixed chance to convert Zombies to Forgottens under Y level selected in previous option:
When this value is below 0, chance of converting increases by 1% with every Y level below value specified in previous option
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Convert Spiders to Armored Spiders under selected Y level:
Spiders have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.f: Fixed chance to convert Spiders to Armored Spiders under Y level selected in previous option:
When this value is below 0, chance of converting increases by 1% with every Y level below value specified in previous option
Fixed chance to convert Skeletons to Undead Warriors under Y level selected in previous option:
When this value is below 0, chance of converting increases by 1% with every Y level below value specified in previous option
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Convert Skeletons to Undead Warriors under selected Y level:
Skeletons have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.c: Convert creepers to cave creepers under selected Y level:
Creepers have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.f: Fixed chance to convert Creepers to Cave Creepers under Y level selected in previous option:
When this value is below 0, chance of converting increases by 1% with every Y level below value specified in previous option
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.w: Chance to convert Wither Skeleton to Executioner
For example, when set to 10, Wither Skeleton will have 10% chance to convert to Executioner after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.g: Chance to convert Ghast to Nightmare
For example, when set to 10, Ghast will have 10% chance to convert to Nightmare after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.p: Chance to convert Piglin to Infected Piglin
For example, when set to 10, Piglin will have 10% chance to convert to Infected Piglin after spawning
Chance to convert Piglin Brute to Infected Piglin Brute
For example, when set to 10, Piglin Brute will have 10% chance to convert to Infected Piglin Brute after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Chance to convert Skeleton to Soul Stealer
For example, when set to 30, Skeleton will have 30% chance to convert to Soul Stealer after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.m: Chance to convert Magma Cube to Lava Slime
For example, when set to 50, Magma Cube will have 50% chance to convert to Lava Slime after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.z: Chance to convert Zombie to Explorer in jungle, or lush cave:
For example, when set to 90, Zombie will have 90% chance to convert to Explorer after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
Chance to convert Zombie to Frozen Zombie on snowy biomes:
For example, when set to 90, Zombie will have 90% chance to convert to Frozen Zombie after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Chance to convert Spider to Tropical Spider in jungle:
For example, when set to 70, Spider will have 70% chance to convert to Tropical Spider after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
Chance to convert Slime to Toxic Slime in mangrove swamp:
For example, when set to 10, Slime will have 10% chance to convert to Toxic Slime after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
Chance to convert Skeleton to Corsair in ocean or beach:
For skeletons spawned in ocean or beach. Doesn't affect Corsairs spawning on Shipwrecks
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.z: Chance to convert Zombified Piglin to Zombified Piglin Brute:
For example, when set to 12, Piglin Brute will have 12% chance to convert to Zombified Piglin Brute after spawning
Chance to convert Zombie to Bloated Corpse in swamps:
For example, when set to 90, Zombie will have 90% chance to convert to Bloated Corpse after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.c:
List of weapons, that Corsair can spawn with, in the following pattern: 'Item;Chance;Item;Chance' 
 Sum of chances cannot be greater than 1.0
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Additional magic damage dealt by soul stealer
On normal difficulty this value is increased by 1. On hard, by 3
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.t: Time to remove lava left by Lava Slime
20 = 1s. Set it to 10 (or lower) to prevent lava from disappearing
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.b: Minimal difficulty at which Bloated Corpse's cloud deals poison damage
Set to NONE to remove poison damage from the cloud
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.c: Convert Zombies to Frozen Zombies in powder snow
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.e: Enable Frozen Zombie's conversion to normal zombie
Frozen Zombies become normal zombies after spending some time exposed to sunlight, fire or water
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.u: Skeletons with enchanted bow always convert to undead warrior with bow

List of weapons that Undead Warrior can spawn with in the following pattern: 'Item;Chance;Item;Chance' 
 Sum of chances cannot be greater than 1.0
List of status effects Undead Warrior's arrows can apply [/reload Required]
Status effect, duration and amplifier separated with semicolon: 'StatusEffect;duration;amplifier;StatusEffect;duration;amplifier;[...]'
Minimal amount of tipped arrows Undead Warrior can spawn with
Maximal amount of tipped arrows Undead Warrior can spawn with
Undead Warrior's tipped arrow drop chance per tipped arrow held
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s:
List of weapons, that Soul Stealer can spawn with, in the following pattern: 'Item;Chance;Item;Chance' 
 Sum of chances cannot be greater than 1.0
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.e:
List of weapons, that Executioner can spawn with, in the following pattern: 'Item;Chance;Item;Chance' 
 Sum of chances cannot be greater than 1.0

List of helmets, that Executioner can spawn with, in the following pattern: 'Item;Chance;Item;Chance' 
 Sum of chances cannot be greater than 1.0

List of chestplates, that Executioner can spawn with, in the following pattern: 'Item;Chance;Item;Chance' 
 Sum of chances cannot be greater than 1.0

List of leggings, that Executioner can spawn with, in the following pattern: 'Item;Chance;Item;Chance' 
 Sum of chances cannot be greater than 1.0

List of boots, that Executioner can spawn with, in the following pattern: 'Item;Chance;Item;Chance' 
 Sum of chances cannot be greater than 1.0
